Hello All,

            I just downloaded the D3 today and wanted to build a simple chart,so following is my line of code in XAML.This is a WPF application

<Window x:Class="LineSample.Window1"    xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"    xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns:c="http://research.microsoft.com/DynamicDataDisplay/1.0"    Title="Line sample" Height="300" Width="300"> 

  <Grid>                   <c:ChartPlotter Name="plotter" >                                     </c:ChartPlotter>    </Grid></Window>

I can see the chart after running with x-axis and y-axis all set with a difference of 0.2. I want to change the range. Also in future I want the range to be set pro grammatically behind the code.I cannot find in documentation to know how to do it.If anyone knows please help.

 

Thanks in advance

Regards
